Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad del Estado de Aguascalientes
Ley de Movilidad Sustentable y de Transporte de Baja California
Ley de Transporte del Estado de Chihuahua
Content: The vehicle must have seat belts for all passengers, front airbags, ABS brakes, first aid tools, ABC universal fire extinguisher, at least four doors, window tinting not exceeding 20%, air conditioning, and reflective safety signs.

Legal Basis: Reglamento en Materia de Transporte de la Let de Movilidad y Seguridad Vial del Estado de Campeche
Content: It establishes that 4-wheel vehicles must be used.

Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad y Transporte del Esado de Chiapas
Content: Requires that the vehicle have seat belts, air conditioning, sound system, and front airbags.

Legal Basis: Reglamento de la Ley de Movilidad de la CDMX
Ley de Transporte y Movilidad Sustentable para el Estado de Coahuila
Content: It establishes that sedan-type vehicles must be used.

Legal Basis: Ley de Transportes para el Estado de Durango
Content: Requires that the vehicle have seat belts, air conditioning, sound system, and front airbags.

Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad del Estado de Guanajuato y sus municipios
Content: It establishes that the driver must have a type A or B license; type D (motorcycle) is not valid.

Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad y Transporte para el Estado de Hidalgo
Content: It establishes that all individual transport services must use sedans or station wagons.

Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad y Transporte del Estado de Jalisco
Content: It prohibits the use of motorcycles for transport services without prior authorization (Art. 215). It establishes that vehicles from transport companies must have an "interior".

Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad  y Seguridad Vial del Estado de México y sus Municipios
Content: It establishes that mototaxi services must be linked to bases, terminals, or authorized sites.

Legal Basis: Ley General de Movilidad y Seguridad Vial del Estado de Michoacán
Ley de Movilidad del Estado de Nayarit
Content: Requires that the vehicle have seat belts, air conditioning, four doors, sound system, and front airbags.

Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad Sostenible, de accesibilidad y seguirdad vial para el Estado de Nuevo León
Content: Requires at least front airbags, air conditioning, and ABS brakes.

Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad para el Estado de Oaxaca
Content: It establishes that mototaxi concessions will only be granted to individuals.

Legal Basis: Reglamento de la Ley de Transporte del Estado de Puebla
Content: The Ministry of Mobility will “promote” that vehicles include seat belts, front airbags, ABS brakes, child restraint anchors, and electronic stability control (Art. 31). Vehicles must have a minimum invoice value of 3000 UMAs (Art. 40).

Legal Basis: Ley de la Agencia de Movilidad y Modalidades de Transporte Público para el Estado de Querétarp
Content: It establishes that vehicles must have four doors, air conditioning, seat belts, and front airbags.

Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad del Estado de Quintana Roo
Content: It establishes that vehicles must have four doors, air conditioning, sound system, seat belts, and front airbags.

Legal Basis: Ley de Transporte Público del Estado de San Luis Potosí
Content: The vehicle must have a capacity for 5 people, airbags, anti-lock brakes, and a 260-liter trunk.

Legal Basis: Ley de Transporte del Estado de Sonora
Content: The service from network companies can be “provided using any type of transport”.

Legal Basis: Reglamento de la Ley de Movilidad para el Estado de Tabasco
Content: Any vehicle used to provide individual passenger transport service in any mode must have four doors.

Legal Basis: Ley de Transporte del Estado de Tamaulipas
Content: It establishes that vehicles must have four doors, air conditioning, seat belts, and front airbags.

Legal Basis: Ley de Comunicaciones y Transporte
Content: It establishes that platform-based services are considered public transport but does not specify further regulation.

Legal Basis: Ley de Tránsito y Transporte del Estado de Veracruz
Content: The only passenger transport service considered is taxi.

Legal Basis: Ley de Movilidad y Seguridad Vial del Estado de Yucatán
Content: The service may only be provided by four-wheeled motor vehicles.
